title: A Reidemeister Theorem for Solid Ribbon Torus Links
abstract:
A complete Reidemeister characterisation of welded links is a long-standing
open problem. We present a Reidemeister Theorem for a related class of
four-dimensional links, solid ribbon torus links: immersed solid tori in R4
with only ribbon singularities, considered up to generalised ribbon isotopy.
